backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing Valentine UI, evasive button behavior, meme reveal, theme, and related files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short descriptive summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining light/dark palettes and core layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component showing the Valentine prompt, Yes/No buttons, evasive No logic, and meme reveal on Yes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor using Internet Identity and reactâ€‘query.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Hook computing random safe positions for the No button and handling pointer/touch triggers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module for backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles and pink-themed OKLCH variables, animations, and typography.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry script wiring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended theming, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a Valentine proposal webpage with Yes/No interaction, evasive No button, meme reveal on Yes, and pink/white theme for iPad Chrome.
